p.e:
A carrier is a good
investment. it is faster,
has more space and
is more durable than a
gear mover, but they
lack offensive stats, so
make sure that the path
is secure.

Gearmovers can attack.
they have a range of 0,
so it's more like running
over folks.
good against infantry.

Put bricky cubes on top
of bricky cubes to make
stronger walls.
If a bricky cube breaks,
everything on top will
"fall down".

The best area denial is
a bricky cube with a
turret and a bricky sand
bag on top of it. they're
designed to go well
together.
Don't forget to add a few
flakatakas and such tho
